mc_user_reviews.text: This movie is a perfect example of how movies like this can change Disney's reputation of being a family friendly company. Movies like these have little sentimental value and is quite meaningless. The 'one' of my score is because this movie may 'inspire' young tweens trying to live their dream of becoming a world-famous rockstar. But movies like these are not recommended.
Awful..... WHY ON EARTH MAKE A CONCERT MOVIE OF ONE OF THE MOST FORGETFUL BANDS IN THE COUNTRY. THEY CAN'T EVEN SING. I give this movie 5% of a good movie
